name: Operation. Connect.
description:
Operation. Connect. is a game created for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022!

This is a stealth game where you play as Erron, a robot programmed to reconnect electric grids. Your job is to reconnect the electric grids within the junkyard before your battery runs out! But watch out, the NEGBOTS will be searching for you, and if they get you it's game over!

The game contains three levels and is VERY ROUGH, but have fun and be sure to let us know what you think!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Right Shift - Run

L - interact

---

Created by TKG Studios

Programming / Game Design / Level Design - Mister Behavior

Music / Level Design / Character Models - Nalonoid

Level Design - GabeTheDeadFish

Drawings - Z.Ito

---

This game was created using the Simple Top Down Controller Asset from TKG Studios, available on the Unity Asset Store!
